comments.text:
+Kire667 Yeah, Windows didn't like people blowing up their computers so 
they built in an extra step in the calculating process where it checks to 
see if you are trying to divide by 0. If you are, it displays the text and 
doesn't do the calculation. If you aren't, it goes ahead with the 
calculation. You'd better be glad because if Windows didn't have that, your 
computer would be a small burnt crisp right now.

comments.author: Goofy973

comments.text:
That's not dividing by zero, that's subtracting zero. Division is basically 
compounded subtraction, so if you divide twenty-one by seven, you are 
essentially subtracting seven from twenty-one until you reach zero, then 
counting how many times you were able to subtract, or three times: 21-7=14, 
14-7=7, 7-7=0. One, two, three.
If you do this with any number and zero, it is more complicated: 21-0=21, 
21-0=21, 21-0=21, 21-0=21… This will continue on infinitely, and so there 
is no final answer. You CANNOT divide by zero.
comments.author: Cody H.

Grab a calculator and put in 10 divide by 0. There is an error, that is 
what he meant. That's what causes our computers to over heat and die. It 
tried dividing by zero, and since it can't process it that well it makes it 
go crazy. (but first check if your router is working correctly)

comments.author: paperbullet1945

comments.text:
actually the divide by would be the number of people receiving apples in 
this case, so if you have 10 and if you divide by 1 person (yourself) you 
keep all your apples. if you divide it by 0 people, then no one gets any 
apples. You would have to add +10 apples to regain them. probably why they 
say you cant divide by o. because 1 is considered the group as a whole all 
going to one source vs them going to 0 sources.

captions.text: ANC PRESENTS A BRAND NEW VERSION OF BREAKING BAD!
>>IT'S EXACTLY LIKE THE ORIGINAL WITH A FAMILY FRIENDLY TWIST.
>>YOU WANT TO TEACH CRYSTAL CLEAR MATH?
I KNOW HOW TO INSTRUCT AND YOU KNOW THE STUDENTS
SO WE GOING TO LIKE MAKE MATH.
WE'RE GOING TO NEED A SAFE PLACE TO TEACH.
A SHOT FOR SHOT REMAKE OF THE ORIGINAL HIT
SERIES BREAKING BAD, BUT THIS TIME IT'S FUN
>>THESE GEOMETRIC PROOFS ARE LIKE TWO PAGES LONG.
>>NOW I NEED YOU TO DISTRIBUTE THESE TO EVERY
THOSE KIDS CRAVE MATH MORE THAN ANYONE.
>>YOU WRITE ALL OF YOUR MATH IN BLUE INK?
WHAT IF YOU MAKE LIKE A MISTAKE?
LIKE I CAN TAKE ON ANY COMPLEX FRACTIONS!
THIS GUYS SEEMS TO BE TAKING OVER.
EVEN THE PREP SCHOOLS ARE GETTING NERVOUS.
>>WE GOT TO FIND HIM BEFORE ANOTHER NERD GETS KILLED,
>>SO WHAT ARE WE GOING TO DO ABOUT THAT GUY?
PARTIAL DERIVATIVES, BUT WHAT IS X?
I FORGOT SOMETHING IN THE CAR.
>>EXPERIENCE ALL THE DRAMA FROM THE ORIGINAL WITHOUT ANY OF
>>IT'S ONLY TEMPORARY UNTIL I CAN GET MY TEACHER'S CERTIFCATE.
>>PEOPLE WHO USE MATH AFTER COLLEGE DESERVE TO GO TO PRISON.
>>AND HOW MUCH MATH ARE YOU EXPECTING EXACTLY?
THAT'S LIKE A 100 EQUATIONS PER DAY,
>>I'M NOT SURE HE SHOULD BE TEACHING.
NOW, HOW MUCH WILL WE BE PAID GUS?
THAT'S LIKE A 1,000 DOLLARS PER WEEK MR.WADE.
THIS SHOW PUTS THE ACTION BACK IN FRACTION!
>>WHAT ARE WE GOING TO DO MR. WADE?

GUS IS GOING TO KILL US WHEN HE FINDS OUT
ABOUT ALL
THE PRE-CALCULUS WE'VE BEEN DOING ON THE SIDE.
>>I TOLD YOU I'D TAKE CARE OF IT.
>>TUNE IN THIS FALL TO THE SHOW THE NEW YORK TIMES CALLS

AND DON'T FORGET TO TUNE IN NEXT SPRING AS
ANC TURNS THE WALKING
ALL A PART OF THE NEW ANC FAMILY.
